paragraph.paragraph:
To reparent an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject object , you need to
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlpick_and_drop pick the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject object and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlpick_and_drop drop it on the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject object you wish it to be parented in. The
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject object will be removed from its current parent, and inserted in the new parent at the next available position.

When an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject object is inserted into a parent, it is always added at the next available position. If you wish to place an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject object at a particular position within a parent, you must hold down the Shift key, and drop on an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject object already contained in parent, Your
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject object will then be inserted in the parent, in the position preceding the child
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject object that you dropped on.

You can access
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject objects from both the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/60_builder_window/index.xml builder window and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/20_layout_constructor/index.xml layout constructor .
paragraph.note: Note Although window and dialog objects may be accessed within the ../../reference/64_widget_selector/index.xmlwidget selector, it is not possible to build into these objects, you should use the ../../reference/20_layout_constructor/index.xmllayout constructor or ../../reference/60_builder_window/index.xmlbuilder window directly in this situation.
paragraph.paragraph:
For more information about an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject objects capacity and permitted children, see the
/libraries/vision2/00_introduction.xml EiffelVision2 documentation.
